Overall, "The Watcher" is a compelling movie with interesting plot twists and unexpected turns.

The plot of the movie revolves around Annie Hall's relationship with her husband Paul. Throughout the film, we see how their different personalities affect their relationship.

One of the most memorable scenes of the movie is when Paul finally realizes that his marriage has been more about him than her.

Overall, "Annie Hall" is a classic comedy film that is both witty and intelligent. It is definitely worth watching.

Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "Braveheart" and "Divergent". "Braveheart" is a historical drama about William Wallace, the leader of Scotland's rebellion against English rule in the late 1700s. The film stars Mel Gibson as Wallace, Patrick McGoohan as John Stewart, Ernie Hudson as Willoughby Ross, and Jack Warden as George Oldfield.
"Divergent" is a science fiction novel written by Veronica Roth, published in August 2011 by Scholastic Corporation. It has been adapted into the film of the same name directed by Neil Burger, released on February 16, 2014 in Canada and United States. The main character is Tris Prior, a young woman living in the futuristic world of the dystopian nation of Panem.
"Braveheart" received positive reviews from critics and audiences alike. It grossed over $1 billion worldwide, becoming one of the highest-grossing films ever made.
"Divergent" also received positive reviews from critics and audiences alike. It grossed over $40 million worldwide, becoming another highly-grossing film ever made.
In conclusion, both "Braveheart" and "Divergent" are highly-grossing science fiction novels adapted into highly-grossing science fiction films directed by Neil Burger.

If you're looking for a thrilling and action-packed war movie, then "Red Cliff" would be an excellent choice.
This epic historical drama directed by Zhang Yim is based on the events of the battle of Red Cliffs (208 A.D.) between the forces of Liu Bei (Chang Zhong) and Cao Cao (Guan Yu).
The film features a star-studded cast, including renowned actors such as Eric Cantona, John Gielgud, Fanny Ardant, and many more.
Overall, "Red Cliff" is an epic historical drama that is sure to captivate viewers with its thrilling action scenes, compelling character development, and overall epic scope.
